Text: FW RATA and Compliance Testing Cc Juan Per the email below New Albany is requesting the dispatch of two units MW for to hours on Aug for Permit testing This testing is necessary Please advise if this is a problem Rick Broussard Original Message From Goins James Sent Monday July AM To Broussard Richard Cc James CT Thomas NRON Gus nron Subject RATA and Compliance Testing Rick New Albany Power I LLC will be required to perform RATA and Stack testing this year in the rd Quarter to meet the requirements of the Air Permit and the CFR They will be performed together and require day of testing per two units The stack testing requires three one hour runs at base load and then to complete the RATA we will be required to run for an additional six twenty minute runs The testing is scheduled for the week of August to coinside best with all parties schedules The actual testing times will be August for units and August for units and and August for units and We have one extra day scheduled which is August to complete an additional lenearity test which is also required by the permit and the CFR The required pre testing notification has been submitted to the MDEQ It will require at least hours on each unit to complete the test due to stabalization of the monitoring equipment between the test runs Therefore I would like to request a to hour dispatch for two units on August th th and th to perform the testing Please let me know if we can get the dispatch on the requested day to perform the testing Thank You James Goins

RunHours Data for Brownsvilleand Jinsung Below are my calculations for runhours and annual MWs The startsyear is an estimate and fuel usestart are estimates only I would say that these estimates are conservative and are used to make sure that emissions are kept below limits Rick Heat Rate Basis Unit Unit Output Basis Unit MW Unit MW Emissions Limits NOx tonsyr CO tonsyr Fuel MMBtuyr

CTG Cc Forwarded by Richard BroussardCorpEnron on AM Ron NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Richard NRON cc Jon NRON Subject CTG Richard Pat just informed me that you need numbers for starts and hours on Unit Unit had MarkV problems in the past that needed to be corrected by shutting down the system This erased any historical information that the machine had stored Unit and were started up within one or two days apart There should be minimal difference between the two of them We ran units as brother and sister during the first year of operation so I would feel very confident with the following numbers Fired Hours Fired Starts Emergency Stops Peak Fired Hours Total Starts If you need further assistance please let me know Ron D

Brownsville Performance Data Cc Please provide this information to Benjamin Rogers I am on vacation this week and dont have access to the data Thanks Rick Forwarded by Richard BroussardCorpEnron on AM Benjamin CT PM To Richard nron cc Subject Rick Here is the file with the performance data we worked on for the s A Brownsville tab has been added could you please assist us in putting this data together for Brownsville Please give me a call if you have any questions Thanks Ben

Re Wheatland Vibration Problem Cc I spoke to Ross Newlin regarding the vibration problems The Westinghouse engineers corrected the problem to the point that it was below alarm limits There is no plan to repair the problem during the November outage since it requires significant run time and the economics are not there for a November run However West has committed to come back to the plant in January when we can schedule some run time Ross will try to track down the minutes of the outage planning meeting to document this Ill forward them to you when I get them Rick Benjamin CT AM To Richard nron cc Subject Rick Here are some questions we are working on where we need a little assistance Check question and any others Thanks Ben

Peaker Turbine Nominal Output Cc the nominal outputs for the turbines at ISO F Hum psi Wheatland Type PowerkW Heat Rate BtukWh LHV Unit WDA Unit WDA Unit WDA Unit WDA Lincoln Center Unit PGEA Unit PGEA Unit PGEA Unit PGEA Unit PGEA Unit PGEA Unit PGEA Unit PGEA Gleason The Gleason nominal values are not available We will have to use corrected numbers unless more information becomes available Rick
Wheatland Test Dataverified the Wheatland test data in the reports Keep the MWs and Heat Rates I gave you Rick
Peaker Performance resultsThe attached file has the information from the performance test for the peakers I am still trying to track down some of the equipment information Rick
